definition: the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
(negative prefix)/not/no
to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)
to lose/to miss/to fail

sentences.english: Some clothes are not the advisability of using either washing machines wash, or it will lose.
sentences.chinese: 有些衣物则不宜用洗衣机洗涤，否则将得不偿失。

sentences.english: This is a Pyrrhic victory for Basildon council.
sentences.chinese: 对于巴西尔登地方议会来说，这个胜利得不偿失。

sentences.english: This is why I say this is a Pyrrhic victory.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么我把这看作一种得不偿失。

sentences.english: In general, using regulation to create a pared-down financial industry will be costly.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，监管只能束缚金融业，得不偿失。

sentences.english: They get excited about their Pyrrhic victory.
sentences.chinese: 他们为自己得不偿失的胜利而兴奋。

definition: to save a little only to lose a lot (idiom)
not worth it
to produce the opposite of the desired result
it isn't worth it/not cost-effective/not profitable/too expensive
having given away a bride, to lose one's army on top of it (idiom)/to suffer a double loss after trying to trick the enemy
pinyin: pei2 le5 fu1 ren2 you4 zhe2 bing1

definition: to waste all one's previous efforts (idiom)/all that has been achieved goes down the drain
it will cause no end of trouble (idiom)
to overreach oneself/to try to be clever and end up with egg on one's face
harmful and without benefit (idiom); more harm than good
to neglect the root and pursue the tip (idiom)/to neglect fundamentals and concentrate on details
lit. to try to steal a chicken only to end up losing the rice used to lure it (idiom)/fig. to try to gain an advantage only to end up worse off/to go for wool and come back shorn
pinyin: tou1 ji1 bu4 cheng2 shi2 ba3 mi3

definition: to cost one dearly/to end disastrously/to pay bitterly
irreversible
to let go of the big prize while grabbing at trifles (idiom)
pinyin: jian3 le5 zhi1 ma5 diu1 le5 xi1 gua1

definition: twice the effort for half the result
if not/otherwise/else/or else
